articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Hwasong-12 Launching Drill Again
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Hwasong-12 Launching Drill Again
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided once again a launching drill of the medium-and-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 on the spot.
					 He was greeted by Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik, Jo Yong Won, Yu Jin and other leading officials of the C.C., WPK, General of the Strategic Force Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the KPA Strategic Force, and Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho and other officials in the field of defence scientific research.
					
					 Participating in the drill were scientists and technicians in the field of rocket research and the Hwasong-12 rocket operation unit of the KPA Strategic Force.
					
					 The launching drill was conducted with the aim at calming down the belligerence of the U.S. which has recently cried out for using military muscle against the DPRK, and at bolstering up operation capability for attack and counterattack to counter it with swift and powerful military counteraction, examining the order to deal with nuclear warheads and confirming action procedures of actual war.
					
					 The Hwasong artillerymen were rapidly deployed to the launching ground at early morning under a sudden order of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. They were waiting for the moment to launch ballistic rocket after launching preparation under skillful organization and command.
					
					 He arrived at the launching ground, learned about the launch plan and preparation and issued an order to launch the medium-and-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12.
					
					 At the moment, Hwasong-12 zoomed to the sky with dazzling flash and big explosion.
					
					 The fired ballistic rocket crossed the sky above Hokkaido of Japan along the preset flight track and accurately hit the preset target waters in the Pacific.
					
					 Highly appreciating that the current launching drill of very great meaning in increasing combat power of the nuclear force attained its aim, Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the successful launching drill.
					
					 Praising the Hwasong artillerymen for handling the rocket well with skilful firepower service, he said with pride that the combat efficiency and reliability of Hwasong-12 were thoroughly verified, operation members' capacity for actual war is also very perfect and the work for increasing combat power of Hwasong-12 has been realized.
					
					 He noted that all drills should become meaningful and practical ones for increasing combat power of the nuclear force like the current drill in the future, and the order to deal with nuclear warheads should be strictly established suited to their deployment for actual war.
					
					 He underlined for the scientists and technicians in the field of rocket research and Hwasong artillerymen to put rockets on a modern and ultra modern basis and develop the operation level onto a higher stage with their close combination.
					
					 He told leading officials of the Department of Munitions Industry of the Party Central Committee and the field of defense scientific research accompanying him that our final goal is to establish the equilibrium of real force with the U.S. and make the U.S. rulers dare not talk about military option for the DPRK. And he stressed the need to run at full speed and straight, continuing to qualitatively consolidate the military attack capacity for nuclear counterattack the U.S. cannot cope with. 
					
					 As recognized by the whole world, we have made all these achievements despite the UN sanctions that have lasted for decades but never made them from any "benefit" of the UN, he said, adding it is very stifling for those countries styling themselves big powers keeping their minds on bringing to their knees the DPRK through UN sanctions. 
					
					 We should clearly show the big power chauvinists how our state attain the goal of completing its nuclear force despite their limitless sanctions and blockade, he said, underlining the need to put an end to them with the all-state efforts as it has nearly reached the terminal.

articles.title: ITF Members Visit Grave of Choe Hong Hui
articles.content:
ITF Members Visit Grave of Choe Hong Hui
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships visited the grave of Choe Hong Hui, former president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri here on Saturday.
					 Among them were President Ri Yong Son and executive members of ITF, overseas Koreans and bereaved family members.
					
					 They laid wreaths and bouquets at the grave and observed a moment's science in memory of Choe Hong Hui.

articles.title: Taekwon-do Teams and Delegations Here
articles.content:
Taekwon-do Teams and Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Teams and delegations of different countries arrived here Saturday to take part in the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships.
					 They included teams and delegations from South Africa, Morocco, Macedonia, Mongolia, Bulgaria, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Belarus, Iran, Indonesia and Estonia.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a meeting on September 8 to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Attending it were Chairman Kim Chil Song and members of the Confederation and other Koreans in Russia.
					
					 Speakers there referred to the historic significance of the birth of the DPRK, warmly congratulating its 69th birthday.
					
					 They praised the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They stressed that the recent eye-opening events in the DPRK served as an important occasion that fully demonstrated before the world the matchless pluck of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the invincible might of the Korean people single-mindedly united in the transparent spirit of defending socialism.
					
					 And they extended full support and solidarity to the people in the homeland resolutely struggling against the sanctions and nuclear war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Sojourn of Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Sojourn of Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK led by Kim Chong, director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The members of the group went round the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum which displays historical data and relics showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 At the old home, they looked round historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the head of the group said:
					
					 The visit makes me miss the President very much.
					
					 He, who embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years and liberated the country, is the eternal sun of Juche and founder of socialist Korea whom the Korean nation greeted for the first time in its history of 5 000 years. 
					
					 He saved the Koreans in Japan from the fate of stateless nation and put forward them as overseas citizens of an independent and sovereign state. 
					
					 His great revolutionary life and immortal feats will shine forever.
					
					 We will hold in high esteem the great leaders and usher in a new heyday of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan at any cost under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The group also toured the Sci-Tech Complex, Pyongyang Primary School for Orphans and other objects.

articles.title: Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Distributed as Document of UNGA and UNSC
articles.content:
Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Distributed as Document of UNGA and UNSC
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A letter sent by the DPRK permanent representative at the United Nations to the president of UNSC was distributed as an official document A/71/1032-S/2017/735 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on September 12.
					 The letter strongly requested the UNSC to discuss as an emergency agenda item the issue of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, a grave threat to international peace and security.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Poor Calculation Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Poor Calculation Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Much upset by the ceaseless and toughest offensive against the U.S. taken by the DPRK, a world-level nuclear weapons state, the south Korean authorities make all kinds of desperate efforts to get rid of their military inferiority.
					 They are asking their U.S. master for regular fielding of strategic assets on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Now underway every day are confabs over the proposal of making it routine the deployment of the U.S. strategic bombers on the Korean peninsula from Guam and the U.S. mainland and their maintenance in the peninsula, and the proposal for the deployment and permanent fielding of ultra-modern reconnaissance plane, Aegis destroyer, nuclear submarine and nuclear carrier strike groups.
					
					 They have gone so busy to introduce the U.S. ultra-modern hardware that even U.S. President Trump disclosed an intention for arms sale, hinting at "allowing south Korea to purchase sophisticated military hardware".
					
					 Assertions about "going nuclear" are heard from the puppet forces amid the building up of the opinion over the redeployment of the U.S. tactical nuclear weapons.
					
					 Puppet Defense Minister Song Yong Mu and others are revealing practical movement after stressing the need to "examine" the issue of the redeployment of the U.S. tactical nuclear weapons.
					
					 The conservative forces including Free Korea Party are going busy, calling for "10 million signature campaign" and sending a letter to the U.S. president, talking about "nearly equal opinion over nuclear weaponization" and stressing the "need to establish stable order of nuclear balance".
					
					 The essence of the puppet forces' racket is that "the DPRK achieved the nuclear monopolization on the Korean peninsula through the development of nuclear weapons known as an absolute weapon and this has posed threats to the existence of south Korea and its people".
					
					 They are unaware of the essence of the issue of bolstering the state nuclear force and also fail to foresee the consequences to be entailed by their racket. This leads to a conclusion that they are puppet forces in every aspect.
					
					 The puppet forces stress the necessity for the redeployment of the U.S. tactical nuclear weapons and for them to "go nuclear on their own", and this will only result in acknowledging the DPRK's position as a nuclear weapons state which they have so far denied with all efforts.
					
					 This will, on the other hand, bring into bolder relief the wretched situation of the stooges who can not fire even a bullet, to say nothing of supporting themselves without "protection" or approval by the U.S.
					
					 The call for redeployment of the U.S. tactical nuclear weapons and the assertion of "going nuclear on their own" will cause more serious problem.
					
					 In case south Korea upsets the nuclear balance in the region and opts for "going nuclear" in the face of huge economic, political and military challenges from neighboring countries for the humiliating THAAD deployment, the ensuing danger will be beyond imagination.
					
					 What matters here is the true aim sought by the U.S. in talking about "tightening alliance" and offer of a nuclear umbrella.
					
					 The U.S. magazine "National Interest" website, reporting Trump's assertions made during election campaign that he would not doggedly oppose Japan and south Korea going nuclear independently, commented that even though it could not be considered the most ideal method, it could be much wiser way than letting the U.S. continue to stand at the outpost line of the disastrous confrontation. The magazine added that now it is necessary to hand over the danger to countries that regard it as the most important interests to deter the DPRK.
					
					 So poor is the despicable behavior of the puppet forces going desperate to keep the Pandora's box, being unaware of whom their destiny depend on. 
					
					Written by Ri Kyong Ju

articles.title: Sosan Hotel in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sosan Hotel in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- There is Sosan Hotel for sportspersons at the sports village in Chongchun Street, Pyongyang, the DPRK.
					 Now the hotel is crowded with Taekwon-Do players and fans from different countries and regions of the world to participate in the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships.
					
					 It serves foreign dishes as well as well-known Korean foods like sinsollo (dish in cooking brazier), kimchi and Pyongyang cold noodle.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Song Hye Gyong, an official of the hotel, said:
					
					 The 30-storied hotel was opened on May 1, Juche 78 (1989) and reconstructed in October 2015. It has contributed to the sports development of the country and sports exchange with various countries.

articles.title: Koguryo Subak, Origin of Taekwon-Do
articles.content:
Koguryo Subak, Origin of Taekwon-Do
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Taekwon-Do, the traditional martial art of Korea, has been widely disseminating in the world.
					 It traces back to Subak (a Korean style of martial art using mainly hands) which was popular in the period of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					
					 The Koguryo people venerated martial arts and their spirit served as a source which gave a birth to Subak.
					
					 Later, Subak had been developed into a martial art using hands and feet and became a part of their daily life.

articles.title: U.S. Will Meet Nuclear Strike and Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Will Meet Nuclear Strike and Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. cooked up another "sanctions resolution" at the United Nations Security Council as part of its unprecedented military threat and sanctions and blockade to stifle the DPRK.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article:
					
					 The U.S. describes the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defense as the "biggest threat to peace", but it is no more than a shameful logic and a brigandish deed to justify its crimes against peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has had access to everything and gained everything it could do despite the harshest sanctions and blockade by the hostile forces, and it is a daydream to calculate that the DPRK can be shaken to change its attitude in face of the new "sanctions".
					
					 The enemies' reckless and ridiculous sanctions, pressure, threat and blackmail will offer an opportunity to the DPRK to bolster up its deterrence, while bring bitterer disgrace to them.
					
					 The DPRK, which towered as the most powerful nuclear weapons state despite the unprecedented difficulties and trials, is not afraid of any sanctions, pressure and war. It is now in full readiness to destroy the enemies' bases with its resolute and preemptive strike if they show any slight sign of provocation.
					
					 In case the U.S. opts for confrontation and war at last, defying the strategic position of the DPRK, nuclear power of Juche and a world military giant, it will meet horrible nuclear strike and miserable and final ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Confrontation with Compatriots
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive, at a recent international meeting held abroad, begged representatives of different countries for "escalating sanctions" on the DPRK. He sent a "video message" to the "2017 Seoul Security Dialogue", which called for those participating countries to show "care and support" for the "sanctions against the north", claiming that "provocation" by the north poses the biggest threat to Northeast Asia. 
					 Meanwhile, the puppet foreign minister and other yes men are getting busy with mendicant diplomacy for "tightened sanctions" like the chief executive.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary brands the reckless moves of the south Korean authorities as last-ditch efforts of those frightened by the thunder of H-bomb and unpardonable treachery to stifle the compatriots in the north with help of outside forces.
					
					 Saying that the bad habit of the south Korean authorities obsessed with dependence on outsiders and confrontation with compatriots remain unchanged, the commentary goes on:
					
					 They are vociferating about "toughest sanctions against the north" according to the scenario of the U.S.
					
					 They are fools as they do not know what the precious wealth of the nation is, who the principal enemy of the nation is and where the guarantee for peace of the Korean peninsula and prosperity of the nation lies.
					
					 What awaits for the traitors keen on sycophancy toward outsiders and confrontation with compatriots will be bitter regret and miserable end.

articles.title: Minju Joson Brands U.S. as War Merchant
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands U.S. as War Merchant
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Trump announced that they would sell off weapons worth billions of U.S. dollars to south Korea. And he allowed Japan and south Korea to increase the quantity for buying U.S.-made military equipment. Timed to coincide with this, a spokesman for the White House at a press conference said that now is not the time to focus on the dialogue with north Korea.
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary says that Trump's behavior goes to clearly prove that he has neither will nor ability to defuse tension on the Korean peninsula but he has only merchant-like calculation to use the aggravated situation as a golden opportunity for making money.
					
					 Noting that Trump suffering from the worst ruling crisis because of his poor political caliber finds his way out in improving the economic performance, the commentary goes on:
					
					 In light of the fact that the sales record of the munitions is in directional proportion of the mounting tension, it is clear what Trump does want.
					
					 He has loudly vociferated about "threats" from the DPRK in a bid to create conditions favorable for the sale of huge amount of weapons, getting zealous in escalating tension.
					
					 Lurking behind it is also his intention to arm Japan and south Korea with the U.S.-made weapons and thus put them under its tighter control and use them as a shock brigade in standing against its strategic rival in Asia and tide over the serious ruling crisis.
					
					 The U.S. getting hell-bent on the sale of lethal weapons against mankind's desire for peace is the war merchant living on human blood.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Wretched Plight Derided
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Wretched Plight Derided 
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in a statement Friday derided the south Korean authorities who were driven into a tight corner in the face of a flurry of criticism of their "north policy" at home and abroad.
					 There is nothing for them to get embarrassed with and they should not blame others for it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 As for the present south Korean authorities' "north policy", it is blamed as "an uncertain policy devoid of clear target", "policy for currying favor with master", "policy carrying false and intrusive assertions" and "policy shunning the desire and requirements of the nation".
					
					 By nature, the present south Korean authorities' "north policy" is full of troublesome and controversial points and is devoid of essence that it is destined to get scrapped.
					
					 "Simultaneous realization of dialogue and pressure", its alleged keynote point, is enough to prove its nature as extremely contradictory and unrealizable sophism.
					
					 The puppet authorities' "north policy" is nothing different from the one-sided policy of confrontation pursued by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye conservative regimes.
					
					 Question is what the south Korean authorities met for pursuing the futile "north policy".
					
					 The north-south relations plunged into a stalemate even before making a start and the south Korean authorities faced a wretched plight, being snubbed and rejected everywhere they went.
					
					 What matters here is that the south Korean candlelight demonstrators who played a key role in the emergence of the present regime began to turn their backs on the regime, displeased with the things done by it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should come to their senses, though belatedly, and draw a due lesson from their wretched plight.
					
					 They have to make a responsible option-whether to pursue the policy for confrontation with the fellow countrymen through sycophancy toward the U.S. while reading the face of the U.S. and the puppet conservative group only to meet miserable ruin or whether to join hands with the fellow countrymen and opt for improving the north-south relations from the stand of national independence as wished by all the Koreans and the candlelight demonstrators.

articles.title: S. Koreans Urge Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue
articles.content:
S. Koreans Urge Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held a Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on September 13 to protest the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 A statement was read out at the rally.
					
					 The statement charged that the Park Geun Hye "government" and the Japanese authorities covered the Japanese imperialists' crimes with unidentified money, neither legal apology nor reparation.
					
					 It accused the Japanese authorities of impudently acting, not recognizing its crimes as assailant but denying the truth.
					
					 The participants held a demo as far as Chongwadae, chanting slogans in demand of the settlement of the sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korea: Regime's Policy of Sycophancy and Confrontation Protested
articles.content:
S. Korea: Regime's Policy of Sycophancy and Confrontation Protested
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on Sept. 13 in an editorial denounced the puppet authorities' policy of dependence on outside forces and confrontation with compatriots.
					 The editorial charged that the present chief executive in a phone message with the Japanese prime minister agreed to implement the UN "resolution on sanctions" against the north in collusion with the U.S. and Japan under the pretence of the nuclear test. It expressed grave concern about the behavior of the present "government" keeping steps with the outsiders' sanctions and pressure on compatriots, while failing to settle the past problems including the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The "government" should stop following the outsiders' scenario and take option for peaceful reunification, the editorial stressed.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Korean Women in Japan
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Korean Women in Japan
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a message from the members of the delegation for marking the 70th anniversary of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan on September 12.
					 The message referred to the fact that Marshal Kim Jong Un invited the delegation to the homeland and showed all kinds of trust and love for it though he was busy with affairs to enhance the dignity and national strength of the DPRK at the highest level.
					
					 All members of the delegation came to feel unforgettable very precious things during their stay in the homeland under the special care of the Marshal, it said.
					
					 Celebrating with the people in the homeland a great auspicious event of the complete success in the test of H-bomb for ICBM, we came to cherish deeper the pride and honor of being overseas citizens of the DPRK led by you, the greatest person whom the whole world admires, it said, adding:
					
					 You are the symbol of the great Paektusan nation's mightiness and the benevolent sun for the people as you are bringing about the final victory in the building of a socialist power and the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists while creating legends of intense loyalty and noble love for the people and posterity.
					
					 The message expressed the will to devote all their patriotic devotion, material and moral, to the building of the best Paektusan power, keeping step with the all-people general offensive in the homeland toward the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners.

articles.title: Education and Culture of DPRK Praised in Switzerland
articles.content:
Education and Culture of DPRK Praised in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on September 5 to mark the 40th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on Socialist Education".
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made public his famous work "Theses on Socialist Education" on September 5, 1977.
					
					 In the work he indicated the main principles of socialist pedagogy.
					
					 The work clearly shows the advantages of the socialist educational system over the capitalist educational system.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a highly-civilized country where education and culture have made rapid development through the work for carrying out the theses on socialist education.

articles.title: DPRK Lauded in Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Lauded in Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations and figures of different countries issued statements between September 4 and 9 to mark the 69th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea in its statement paid high tribute to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and warm friendly feelings to the Korean people and expressed belief that the DPRK would continue to dynamically advance along the road of peace, prosperity and socialism.
					
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Mit Tamor Publishing House of Myanmar, said the nearly 70 year-long  history of the DPRK shows that the DPRK has steadily developed into a socialist state with invincible might under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus in Syria, said that the DPRK occupies a high position in the international arena and its military capability is powerful enough to beat back any formidable enemy at one blow.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces are afraid of the DPRK, he said, adding that the might of the DPRK would remarkably grow stronger on the road of realizing justice.

articles.title: DPRK's Step for Self-defense Hailed in Inodnesia
articles.content:
DPRK's Step for Self-defense Hailed in Inodnesia
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- For the DPRK to steadily bolster up the nuclear force of justice is a legitimate step to defend its sovereignty and rights to existence from the U.S. escalating nuclear threat and sanctions and pressure.
					 The U.S. and hostile forces should clearly see the high strategic position of the DPRK and act with discretion.
					
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said this in a statement released on September 5.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Some days ago, the DPRK successfully tested H-bomb for ICBM.
					
					 This clearly proves that the DPRK has attained the final goal of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 The recent successful test is another victory won by the Korean people in confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to reliably defend their ideology and social system.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Germany
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on Socialist Education" on its website on Sept. 5 to mark the 40th anniversary of the work.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 66 (1977), deals with the main principles of the socialist pedagogy, the contents and methods of socialist education, the duty and role of education institution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir el ejercicio de lanzamiento de Hwasong-12
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir el ejercicio de lanzamiento de Hwasong-12
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a dirigir en el terreno el ejercicio de lanzamiento de "Hwasong-12", cohete balistico estrategico de alcance mediano y largo.
					El Comandante Supremo fue acogido por Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik, Jo Yong Won, Yu Jin y otros funcionarios responsables del Comite Central del PTC, el general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, Jang Chang Ha y Jon Il Ho y otros funcionarios del dominio de investigacion cientifica de defensa nacional. 
					
					En el ejercicio tomaron parte los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de investigacion coheteril y la unidad del cohete de Hwasong-12 de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					
					El entrenamiento de lanzamiento del cohete se realizo bajo el objeto de intensificar mas la capacidad de cumplimiento operacional de ataque y contraataque para aplastar el belicismo de EE.UU., que estos dias habla ruidosamente del empleo de fuerzas militares contra la RPDC, y responderle con la reaccion militar rapida y potente, revisar el orden de administracion de ojivas nucleares y determinar el procedimiento de acciones para el combate. 
					
					Los artilleros de Hwasong, desplegados rapidamente en la manana temprana en el campo de lanzamiento segun la orden inesperada del Comandante Supremo, llevaron a cabo los preparativos de disparo bajo la organizacion y mando diestros y esperaron el momento de lanzamiento. 
					
					Llegado al campo de lanzamiento, el Maximo Dirigente se cercioro del plan de lanzamiento de Hwasong-12 y su estado preparativo y dio la orden de disparo.
					
					Al momento, el cohete subio al cielo estremeciendo con destellos y detonaciones todo el globo terraqueo.
					
					Segun la orbita premeditada de vuelo, el cohete lanzado atraveso el cielo de Hokkaido de Japon y acerto exactamente la zona maritima establecida como blanco en el Oceano Pacifico.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente expuso gran satisfaccion evaluando altamente que el presente ejercicio, que reviste gran significacion en aumentar la combatividad de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, alcanzo su objeto y se realizo de manera exitosa.
					
					Elogio a los artilleros de Hwasong que controlan bien el cohete de tipo Hwasong-12 con los adiestrados movimientos de manejo. Y dijo con orgullo que se han comprobado estrictamente la capacidad combativa y credibilidad de Hwasong-12, es muy perfecta la preparacion de los miembros de manejo para la batalla real y se ha logrado la introduccion de Hwasong-12 para el combate real.
					
					Subrayo en la necesidad de hacer de todos los entrenamientos futuros los ejercicios utiles como hoy para el fortalecimiento de combatividad de fuerzas armadas nucleares y de establecer un estricto orden de tratamiento de las ojivas nucleares de diversos tipos de acuerdo con que estas se emplazan para el combate.
					
					Enfatizo que los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de estudio coheteril deben mantener una estrecha relacion con los artilleros de Hwasong para llevar a la etapa mas alta la modernizacion, la sofisticacion y la mejora del nivel de manejo de los cohetes.
					
					A los cuadros responsables acompanantes del Departamento de Industria Armamentista del CC del PTC y de rama de investigacion cientifica de defensa nacional les agrego que nuestro objeto final es lograr el equilibrio real de fuerza para que los gobernantes norteamericanos no pudieran decir mas tonterias como la opcion militar contra la RPDC y que hay que avanzar con velocidad consolidando sin cesar en lo cualitativa la capacidad de ataque militar capaz de asestar el contraataque nuclear con que no puede competir EE.UU.
					
					Como reconoce todo el mundo, no alcanzamos todos los objetos de hoy por cualquier "beneficio" de la ONU, sino en medio de su sancion mantenida durante decenios, apunto y continuo que son muy absurdas las autodenominadas potencias que piensan en doblegarnos con la sancion de la ONU.
					
					Se necesita demostrar claramente a los chovinistas de gran potencia como nuestro pais alcanza el objeto del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado bajo su sancion y aplastamiento incesantes, senalo e hizo hincapie en que ya llegaron casi al punto final del objeto y hay que concentrar todas las fuerzas nacionales para lograrlo.

articles.title: Vocero de CRN se burla de la miserable situacion de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Vocero de CRN se burla de la miserable situacion de autoridades surcoreanas 
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Estos ultimos dias, las autoridades surcoreanas, que ya se encuentran en aprietos, se hallan entre dos aguas por las fuertes censuras internas y externas a su "politica sobre el Norte (de Corea)".
					En su declaracion del dia 15, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional senala que ellas no tienen nada de quedarse perplejas ni echar la culpa a otros, y prosigue:
					
					La "politica" de las autoridades surcoreanas ha ganado todas las infamias como "politica confusa sin ningun objeto", "politica elaborada para adular al amo gringo", "politica llena de insistencias absurdas y atrevidas", "politica que dio espalda al deseo y la demanda nacionales.
					
					Desde el principio,  la "politica" en cuestion  esta llena de los puntos problematicos y controversiales y carecia de su esencia, debido a lo cual es imposible evitar el fracaso. 
					
					El "paralelismo del dialogo y presion" que se sirve de base de esa "politica" hace saber que esa insistencia es una retorica absurda mas contradictoria e irrealizable.
					
					Tambien, la "politica sobre el Norte" de las autoridades vigentes no tiene diferencia con la politica unilateral de enfrentamiento de los "Poderes" conservadores de Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Entonces, ?que dio esa "politica" a las autoridades surcoreanas?
					
					Las relaciones Norte-Sur se inclinan mas a la fase catastrofica y las autoridades surcoreanas se cayeron en la situacion miserable de ser rechazadas en el interior y exterior del pais.
					
					Lo problematico es que hasta las opiniones populares manifestadas en la lucha con velas encendidas, que trajeron el nacimiento del actual "Poder", comenzaron a dar espaldas al proceder de las autoridades. 
					
					Aunque fuera ahora, las autoridades surcoreanas deben volverse en si y sacar la merecida leccion de su miserable situacion. 
					
					Ellas deberan escoger una opcion responsable: sufrir el arruinamiento tragico al cabo de seguir recurriendo al servilismo proyanqui y la politica de confrontacion fratricida observando la actitud de EE.UU. y los compinches conservadores surcoreanos o marchar por el camino de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas poniendose en la posicion de la independencia nacional y estrechando la mano de la misma nacion de acuerdo con la exigencia de todos los coreanos y las opiniones populares del Sur de Corea manifestadas en la lucha con velas encendidas

articles.title: Taekwondocas visitan la tumba de Choe Hong Hui
articles.content:
Taekwondocas visitan la tumba de Choe Hong Hui
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los participantes en el XX Campeonato Mundial de Taekwondo visitaron el dia 16 la tumba de Choe Hong Hui, ex presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles), situada en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna de Sinmi en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Ri Yong Son, presidente del Comite Internacional de Juegos de Artes Marciales (CIJAM) y presidente de la ITF, los miembros ejecutivos de la ITF, los presidentes de los comites permanentes, los titulares de las federaciones continentales, los delegados de las asociaciones nacionales, los taekwondocas con alto grado, los arbitros del campeonato, los coreanos en ultramar y las familiares del difunto.
					
					  Tras depositar ofrendas y ramos florales ante la tumba, los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del finado.
